title: Adding or deleting photos in the employee's file
content: Photo in the employee's file:To add a photo, execute Shift + click command on the image.To modify an existing photo, execute the same command by moving the mouse over the image.To delete the photo, hold down the keys on your keyboard Shift + Ctrl + click on the image, then answer Yes.To display the photo in schedules and timesheets:Check the option in Preferences user (by clicking on your name at the top right), Then check the box Show Profil Pictures. Helpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
